1.description: Total number of persons admitted to the event(s) insured excluding insured's employees

3.description: The number of linear feet of the premises bordering a street or public highway

4.description: Entire payment by the insured for the services of the insured's employees

5.description: Gross amount of money charged by the insured for the insured's operations or services rendered

6.description: Gross amount of money charged by the insured, concessionaires of the insured, or others trading under the insured's name for products sold or distributed

7.description: Total cost to the insured for each specific project

8.description: Those exposure bases not mentioned above which are on a per unit or per item basis. (i.e. per acre, per teacher, per landing, per policy, per rental unit, each dwelling, each canoe, per each item at a flat charge, etc.)

9.description: All those exposure bases as defined in the rating manual that are not listed above

F.description: Total number of tons of solid substance

G.description: Total number of gallons of liquid substance. (i.e. oil, gasoline, kerosene, etc.)

H.description: Total dollar amount of all assets
